Identity.Tooltip: This is the Seleucid expansion building, similar to Civic Centers for other factions. It is weaker and carries a smaller territory influence, but is cheaper and built faster.
Identity.History: A Military Colony is founded to supply its home city (or kingdom) with a military advantage by projecting power into new territories. Colonists still have allegiance to their home city and are required to supply their hegemon with soldiers and supplies when called to arms.
